 2022-00812022-02-03,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act
SubjectLeave of Absence for the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program from September 1, 2022 to April 30, 2023.
PrecisOrder approving a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to five judges from September 1, 2022 to April 30, 2023 to participate in the National Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program.
